body_html:
• I've deferred removal of CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH out of this PR, in order to keep the scope minimal
  • I've changed the dependencies on caffe2_library to be dependencies on caffe2
  • I've removed a couple include directories. The remainder are necessary, and I've annotated each one with what breaks if you take it out.
  • Adding a dependency on caffe2_gpu does nothing
  • It's not necessary to involve gloo and/or nccl in this PR. They are built and provided to THD/C10D in the exact same manner as before.

I'm eager to revisit some of these things, because they can definitely be improved. However there are many many tangentially-related improvements to get bogged down in, so I'm tightly limiting the scope of each change.

@soumith
